meta.name: description
meta.content: 发布任意内容（随时随地！），自定义一切，查找并关注你喜爱的东西。 今天就创建你自己的 Tumblr 博客吧。

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: tumblelog, blog, tumblog, tumbler, tumblr, tlog, microblog

link.script: var tinyMCE,_sf_startpt=(new Date()).getTime(); var Tumblr = Tumblr || {};

body.class: flag--reblog-ui-refresh flag--wide-right-column is_dashboard identity base identity-refresh dashboard_index logged_in without_auto_paginate layout_standard

div.script:
<%
        var query = results['query'],
            type = results['type'],
            result_titles = {
                'tag' : '\u641c\u7d22',
                'blog' : '\u535a\u5ba2'            },
            items = results['items'];
    %><div class="<%= type %> search_results_section">
<%= result_titles[type] %><% _.each(items, function(item) { %><%
                    var template = _.template(results['item_template']);
                    var item_data = {}; item_data[type] = item;
                    var item_markup = template(item_data);
                %><%= item_markup %><% }); %>

body.script:
<%
        var title = (blog.title && blog.title.length) ? blog.hilite_title : blog.hilite_name;
        var result_class = '';

        if(blog.avatar_url) result_class += ' has_thumb';
        if(blog.is_followed) result_class += ' is_followed';
    %>
<div class="result <%= result_class %>"><a class="result_link" href="http://<%= blog.tumblr_url %>" id="result_link_<%= blog.name %>" tabindex="1" data-tumblelog-name="<%- blog.name %>" data-peepr='{"tumblelog":"<%- blog.name %>"}'><%= title %><% if(blog.avatar_url) {%><span class="result_thumb thumb" style="background-image:url(<%= blog.avatar_url %>)"><% } %><% if(blog.url) { %><%= blog.hilite_url %><% } %>

<%
        var title = '';
        var result_class = '';

        // If tag.is_query, we manufactured this tag in the client
        // It's the current search term in the search field
        // and that term did not return an exact match from the typeahead results
        // so we're prepending it to the result set on the fly
        if (tag.is_query) {
            title = '' + tag.tag + '';
        } else {
            // Some tags don't match the substring and tag.hilite_tag doesn't get set
            // This ifalls back to the plain escaped tag.
            title = tag.hilite_tag || tag.escaped_tag;
        }

        if(!tag.featured && !tag.unread_count) result_class += ' no_count';
        if(tag.thumb) result_class += ' has_thumb';
        if(tag.is_query) result_class += ' is_query';
        if(tag.is_featured) result_class += ' is_featured';

        tag.url = tag.url.replace('/tagged/', '/search/');

        // Skip results that don't have a title
        // because they look broken
        if (!title.length) return;
    %>
<div class="result <%= result_class %>"><a class="result_link search_typeahead" href="<%= tag.url %>" id="result_link_<%- tag.tag.replace(' ','-').toLowerCase() %>" tabindex="1" data-tag-result="<%- tag.tag %>"><%= title %><% if(tag.thumb) {%><span class="result_thumb thumb" style="background-image:url(<%= tag.thumb %>)"><% } %><% if(tag.unread_count) { %><span <% if(tag.unread_count == 1) { %> style="display: block;" <% } else { %> style="display: none" <% } %>>1 个新帖<span <% if(tag.unread_count == 2) { %> style="display: block;" <% } else { %> style="display: none" <% } %>>2 个新帖<span <% if(tag.unread_count == 3) { %> style="display: block;" <% } else { %> style="display: none" <% } %>>3 个新帖<span <% if(tag.unread_count == 4) { %> style="display: block;" <% } else { %> style="display: none" <% } %>>4 个新帖<span <% if(tag.unread_count == 5) { %> style="display: block;" <% } else { %> style="display: none" <% } %>>5 个新帖<span <% if(tag.unread_count == 6) { %> style="display: block;" <% } else { %> style="display: none" <% } %>>6 个新帖<span <% if(tag.unread_count == 7) { %> style="display: block;" <% } else { %> style="display: none" <% } %>>7 个新帖<span <% if(tag.unread_count == 8) { %> style="display: block;" <% } else { %> style="display: none" <% } %>>8 个新帖<span <% if(tag.unread_count == 9) { %> style="display: block;" <% } else { %> style="display: none" <% } %>>9 个新帖<span <% if(tag.unread_count >= 10 || tag.unread_count == '10+' || tag.unread_count == '+10') { %> style="display: block;" <% } else { %> style="display: none" <% } %>>10 个新帖<% } %>

<input name="tumblelog_stretch_header_image" id="tumblelog_stretch_header_image" type="checkbox"<% if(global_theme_params.header_stretch){ print(' checked') } %> />

body.script:
<div class="post_chrome <%- model.type %>" data-post-id="<%- model.id %>">
<% if (typeof model.reblogged_from_name !== 'undefined') { %><a class="reblog_info post_info_link" href="<%- model.reblogged_from_tumblr_url %>" data-tumblelog-name="<%- model.reblogged_from_name %>" rel="noopener" data-peepr='{"tumblelog":"<%- model.reblogged_from_name %>", "postId":"<%- model.reblogged_from_id %>"}'> <%- model.reblogged_from_name %><% if (typeof model.reblogged_from_followed !== 'undefined' && model.reblogged_from_followed === false && model.reblogged_from_name !== currentUser.id) { %><a href="/follow/<%- model.reblogged_from_name %>" class="reblog_follow_button" data-tumblelog-name="<%- model.reblogged_from_name %>" title="关注 <%- model.reblogged_from_name %>" data-peepr='{"tumblelog":"<%- model.reblogged_from_name %>", "postId":"<%- model.reblogged_from_id %>"}'>关注<% } %><% } %>
<%= model.post_html %><% if (typeof model.source_url !== 'undefined' && model.source_title) { %>
Source: <a class="post-source-link post_info_link" target="_blank" href="<%- model.source_url %>" title="<%- model.source_title %>" rel="noopener" <% if (!model.has_custom_source_url) { %> data-peepr='{"tumblelog":"<%- model.source_title %>", "postId":"<%- model.root_id %>"}'<% } %>><%- model.source_title %><% } %><% if (typeof model.tags !== 'undefined' && model.tags.length > 0) { %>
<% if (typeof model.tags !== 'undefined') { %><% _.each(model.tags, function(tag) { %><a class="post_tag" data-tag="<%- tag %>" href="<%- Tumblr.Utils.PostTags.tag_url(tag) %>">#<%- tag %><% }); %><% } %><% } %>
<% if (_.isObject(model.notes)) { %>
<div class="post_notes_label note_count <%- (model.notes.count <= 0) ? 'no_notes' : '' %>"><a class="note_link_current" title="<%- model.notes.current %>" data-less="<%- model.notes.less %>" data-more="<%- model.notes.more %>" data-count="<%- model.notes.count %>" ><%- model.notes.current %>
加载中……显示更多热度<% } %>
<% if (model.can_send_in_message) { %><div class="post_control post-control-icon share" data-subview="share" title="分享" data-tumblelog-uuid="<%- model.tumblelog_uuid %>" data-post-id="<%- model.id %>" data-tumblelog-name="<%- model.tumblelog %>" data-parent-tumblelog-name="<%- _.get(model, 'reblogged_from_name') %>"><% } %><% if (model.can_reply) { %>
<% } %><a class="post_control post-control-icon reblog" href="/reblog/<%- model.id %>/<%- model.reblog_key %>"><div class="post_control post-control-icon like <%- model.liked ? 'liked' : '' %>"><a class="post_permalink" href="<%- model.post_url %>" target="_blank" title="查看帖子 - <%- model.posted_on_tooltip %>" rel="noopener">

<%= name %> <%= title %>
<% if (!following) { %><% } %><% if (has_dismiss) { %> <% } %>
